HTTP API Design Guide

Sorting

use sort (or s) accepting a list of comma seperated field names (allowing to sort on multiple fields) with optional unary negative operator (for sort order)

* `GET /users?s=name` - sorts on `name`-field
* `GET /users?s=-stars,name` - sorts descendingly on `stars`, then ascendingly on `name`
